title: Signed Trade Visa
content:
Signed Trade Visa Scroll Casts "Flesh To Gold" spell.Action The scroll is destroyed upon use.

Signed Trade Visa

Casts "Flesh To Gold" spell.Action

The scroll is destroyed upon use.

Signed Trade Visa is a Scroll and Item in Baldur's Gate 3. Some items can be consumed granting various effects like buffing the Character or restoring HP, while other can be used to interact with the environment or provide Lore about Baldur's Gate 3 world.

Obtained by paying 5000 or more gold (not including gold you throw to her) to Gerringothe Thorm when you give her all of your money when prompted.

(See: Reithwin Town Tollhouse)

A visa promising safe passage to Baldur's Gate, stamped with the letters 'GT'.

Signed Trade Visa Information

Weight: 0.02 Kg. Value: 600 Gp.

Signed Trade Visa Location & Where to Find

Location: Reithwin Town Tollhouse Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by:

Signed Trade Visa Notes & Tips

Rarity: Very Rare Value: 600 Gp. Weight: 0.02 Kg. ID: ??
